words.defineEn: to engage in a conversation or communication where a specific topic is mentioned, often with the intent of sharing thoughts, information, or ideas related to that subject
words.defineVi: tham gia vào một cuộc trò chuyện hoặc giao tiếp khi một chủ đề cụ thể được đề cập, thường với mục đích chia sẻ suy nghĩ, thông tin hoặc ý tưởng liên quan đến chủ đề đó

examples: Things like this take time.
Time is moving on.
The time passed quickly.
Time to bust a move.
The contractor is really taking their time.
words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: Their bread and butter is reporting local events.
The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.
These events occurred within living memory.
The tragic event tore the community out of its sense of normalcy.
The paper’s bread and butter is reporting local events in a small community.
words.defineEn: anything that takes place, particularly something important
words.defineVi: bất cứ điều gì diễn ra, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó quan trọng

examples: In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
That party was off the hook!
The party continued into the wee small hours.
The party is on Friday evening.
But the party was over all too quickly for little Nicole.
words.defineEn: an event where people get together and enjoy themselves by talking, dancing, eating, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một sự kiện nơi mọi người gặp nhau và tận hưởng bằng cách nói chuyện, khiêu vũ, ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.
The bedside radio played softly.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
words.defineEn: to enjoy yourself and do things for fun, like children
words.defineVi: để tận hưởng bản thân và làm những điều cho vui, giống như trẻ em

examples: The children played games in the yard.
Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
The game strikes a great balance between accessibility for younger players and a rewarding challenge for veterans of the genre.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Two could play at that game, smart guy.
words.defineEn: an activity often with fixed rules that we do for amusement or fun
words.defineVi: một hoạt động thường với các quy tắc cố định mà chúng tôi làm để giải trí hoặc vui vẻ

examples: The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
The bell sounded for dinner.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
Dinner is served between 7 and 10 p.m.
words.defineEn: the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
words.defineVi: bữa ăn chính trong ngày, ăn vào giữa ngày hoặc vào buổi tối

examples: That movie knocked my socks off.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie broke all box-office records.
The movie broke box office records in the US.
words.defineEn: a story that is told with a series of pictures that move and sound, shown on television or in a cinema
words.defineVi: một câu chuyện được kể bằng một loạt hình ảnh chuyển động và âm thanh, được chiếu trên truyền hình hoặc trong rạp chiếu phim

examples: His favorite band is playing a concert on Friday night.
When does the concert begin?
Tickets for the concert are like gold dust.
The concert went a bomb and the audience loved every minute of it.
We had a good time at the concert last night.
words.defineEn: a public performance by musicians or singers
words.defineVi: một buổi biểu diễn công cộng của nhạc sĩ hoặc ca sĩ

examples: I enjoyed the temporary exhibition at the museum, which featured contemporary art from around the world.
Lily will cut a dash at the art exhibition, showcasing her creative fashion choices and unique personal style.
He got drunk at the wedding and made an exhibition of himself in front of everyone.
I hope I didn't make an exhibition of myself last night.
The number of visitors to the exhibition, all told, was 2543.
words.defineEn: a public event at which paintings, photographs, or other things are shown
words.defineVi: một sự kiện công cộng mà tại đó các bức tranh, ảnh hoặc những thứ khác được hiển thị

examples: Opera bores the pants off him.
I can only stand opera in small doses.
Which opera did Verdi write first?
Opera is his passion, so. -
He likes the opera, too.
words.defineEn: a musical play sung and performed by singers
words.defineVi: một vở nhạc kịch được hát và biểu diễn bởi các ca sĩ

examples: Sarah's daughter is an accomplished ballet dancer and has won several awards.
She slipped her toes into the comfortable and cushioned toe box of the ballet flats.
Agnes de Mille’s dream ballet took the musical to a daring, expressionist place.
- she took ballet in that same childhood era - Mm-hmm. - of her own childhood.
Memphis jookin is called urban ballet for a reason.
words.defineEn: a form of performing art that narrates a story using elaborate dance movements set to music but no words
words.defineVi: một hình thức biểu diễn nghệ thuật thuật lại một câu chuyện bằng cách sử dụng các động tác khiêu vũ phức tạp được đặt theo nhạc nhưng không có lời

words.defineEn: a  contest between two teams competing against each other using a ball, typically kicked or carried, depending on the specific type of football being played
words.defineVi: một cuộc thi giữa hai đội thi đấu với nhau bằng cách sử dụng một quả bóng, thường là đá hoặc mang, tùy thuộc vào loại bóng đá cụ thể đang được chơi

words.defineEn: a game played by two teams of six players each, with the goal of hitting a ball over a high net and landing it on the opposing team's side of the court without them being able to return it
words.defineVi: một trò chơi được chơi bởi hai đội, mỗi đội sáu người, với mục tiêu đánh bóng qua lưới cao và hạ bóng xuống phần sân của đội đối phương mà họ không thể trả lại bóng

words.defineEn: a game where two teams play on a field with four bases in a square shape and one team pitches the ball to the other team who tries to hit it with a bat and score runs by running around the bases
words.defineVi: một trò chơi trong đó hai đội chơi trên một sân có bốn đế hình vuông và một đội ném bóng cho đội kia, đội này cố gắng đánh bóng bằng gậy và ghi điểm bằng cách chạy quanh các đế

examples: His speeches fanned the flames of racial tension.
She memorized the speech word for word.
I lost the gist of his speech.
His hate-filled speeches make my blood boil!
The politician's speech was all fluff and no substance, just a dog and pony show to get votes.
words.defineEn: a formal talk about a particular topic given to an audience
words.defineVi: một cuộc nói chuyện chính thức về một chủ đề cụ thể được đưa ra cho khán giả

examples: The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: Three players got their marching orders last week.
Our cat produced kittens last week.
My parents give me pocket money every week.
The rebels held the town for many weeks.
The week is divided into seven days.
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of seven days in a calendar
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ bảy ngày trong lịch

examples: The library is often quiet during weekdays.
The library opens at 10 o'clock on weekdays.
They usually wake up at 7 o'clock on weekdays.
On weekdays, he works a summer job at a convenience store.
Most years, the weekday for a date moves forward one day.
words.defineEn: any day of the week other than Saturday and Sunday
words.defineVi: bất kỳ ngày nào trong tuần trừ thứ bảy và chủ nhật

examples: My family and I look forward to the weekend every week.
They visit their grandmother every weekend.
Weekends are when I can work on personal projects.
They often visit their grandparents on weekends.
We often take weekend trips to nearby cities for sightseeing and relaxation.
words.defineEn: the days of the week, usually Saturday and Sunday, when people do not have to go to work or school
words.defineVi: các ngày trong tuần, thường là thứ bảy và chủ nhật, khi mọi người không phải đi làm hoặc đi học

examples: Today is Monday.
I'm going monk mode from Monday.
Jessica died Monday.
I have a team meeting every Monday afternoon.
After a fun weekend I was back in harness on Monday, handling paperwork at my desk.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Sunday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau chủ nhật

examples: Tuesdays usually are my busiest days at work.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
The party will be on Tuesday, rain or shine.
I use Tuesdays to work on my personal projects and hobbies.
I meet my study group at the library on Tuesday afternoons.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Monday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ Hai

examples: Wednesday is my favorite day of the week.
I have a lunch date with my best friend every Wednesday.
Wednesday is the middle of the week.
The deal will be agreed on Wednesday, knock on wood.
They're going on holiday on Wednesday so they're all over the moon.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Tuesday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ ba

examples: Thursday is my daughter's favorite day of the week.
Thursday is the day after Wednesday and before Friday.
Thursday is almost the weekend.
I have a dentist appointment on Thursday.
Robbie opened his heart after a secret charity gig at London's Equinox club on Thursday.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Wednesday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ Tư

examples: The party is on Friday evening.
His favorite band is playing a concert on Friday night.
US President Joe Biden got the clean bill of health on Friday after a detailed physical examination.
My friend's birthday is on a Friday this year.
Matt came round each Friday, regular as clockwork.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Thursday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ năm

examples: A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
The team should walk it on Saturday.
Saturdays are when I plan and prepare meals for the upcoming week.
I look forward to Saturday evenings because I meet up with friends for dinner.
France are playing against Wales on Saturday.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Friday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ sáu

examples: Work on Sunday?
By Sunday morning she was running a temperature.
They gathered in the dining room for Sunday brunch.
Grandma's clabber pancakes are a family favorite for Sunday brunch.
She cooked a mouthwatering pheasant roast for her family's Sunday dinner.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Saturday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ bảy
